instructions: In the Photos app on your iPhone, select the photos and videos you want to share. Tap the Share button , then tap Add to Shared Album. Type a name for the shared album, then tap Next. If you already created a shared album and you want to create a new one, tap Shared Album, then tap New Shared Album. Enter a name, then tap Next. Type the email addresses of the people you want to share the album with. If you want subscribers to be able to view the shared album from an iOS or iPadOS device, be sure to use the email addresses associated with their accounts. Tap Create. Enter a comment, then tap Post.
